<a id="Tweener"></a>

# Tweener

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [CallbackTweener](CallbackTweener.md), [IntervalTweener](IntervalTweener.md), [MethodTweener](MethodTweener.md), [PropertyTweener](PropertyTweener.md), [SubtweenTweener](SubtweenTweener.md)

Abstract class for all Tweeners used by [Tween](Tween.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Tweeners are objects that perform a specific animating task, e.g. interpolating a property or calling a method at a given time. A **Tweener** can't be created manually, you need to use a dedicated method from [Tween](Tween.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="Tweener_signal_finished"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**finished**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Tweener_signal_finished)

Emitted when the **Tweener** has just finished its job or became invalid (e.g. due to a freed object).
